name: part_003
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア3D新ビジュアルお披露目】お待たせ！！君に早く会いたかったよ！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [BB2zYMB-1G4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Smile and Go!!'.
MC section where Flare talks about the song selection and interacts with the audience.
Performance of the song 'Phony' in a street setting.

subtitles.original: ずっと見ていて 私のことを
subtitles.english: Keep watching me

subtitles.original: これから先も 期待してね
subtitles.english: And keep expecting great things from now on

subtitles.original: 予測不可能なワクワクを
subtitles.english: Unpredictable excitement

subtitles.original: 君に送るから
subtitles.english: I'll send it to you

subtitles.original: 君とSmile and Go! 楽しんだもん勝ち
subtitles.english: With you, Smile and Go! The one who enjoys it wins

subtitles.original: 君とSmile and Go! 弾けたもん勝ち
subtitles.english: With you, Smile and Go! The one who pops off wins

subtitles.original: ここに笑顔で集まれば
subtitles.english: If we gather here with smiles

subtitles.original: 最高でしょう
subtitles.english: It'll be the best, right?

subtitles.original: 覚悟とSmile and Go! もお全力で
subtitles.english: With determination and Smile and Go! At full power

subtitles.original: 覚悟とSmile and Go! 遊びまくなわだって
subtitles.english: With determination and Smile and Go! Let's play all out

subtitles.original: この日常が大切な宝物だよ
subtitles.english: This everyday life is a precious treasure

subtitles.original: とびきりの笑顔で行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go with our best smiles

subtitles.original: Smile and Go!
subtitles.english: Smile and Go!

subtitles.original: はい！やあないと思いましたがSmile and Go!
subtitles.english: Yes! You probably thought it wouldn't happen, but Smile and Go!

subtitles.original: 実は中に入れてみました！
subtitles.english: Actually, I put it right in the middle!

subtitles.original: 最初に来ないってことはあとは最後かなーとかね、
subtitles.english: Since it didn't come first, I'm sure some people thought...

subtitles.original: 考えた人もいるんじゃないですか？
subtitles.english: ...maybe it would be last?

subtitles.original: まさかこんなところで来るなんて思ってもいなかっただろう！
subtitles.english: You probably didn't expect it to come at a time like this!

subtitles.original: ちょ、ちょっと待ってめっちゃ疲れたｗ
subtitles.english: Wait, wait a second. I'm exhausted! lol

subtitles.original: いやーなんかね、今日はね、あのー気持ち程度のね、エルフェンドちょっとね、添えさせていただいたんですけど
subtitles.english: Well, today, I've added a little bit of Elfriends to the mix.

subtitles.original: これね、EN日記も見てるー？
subtitles.english: Are you watching, EN Nikki?

subtitles.original: Lookie! Lookie Elfriend, thank you! Thank you for watching!
subtitles.english: Lookie! Lookie Elfriend, thank you! Thank you for watching!

subtitles.original: そして、JP日記も見ているかー！
subtitles.english: And are you watching, JP Nikki?!

subtitles.original: まあこれでねきっとね気持ちは通じてると思うんで、
subtitles.english: Well, I'm sure my feelings are getting through now.

subtitles.original: 全く今動きませんけど、
subtitles.english: I'm not moving at all right now, but...

subtitles.original: みんなの心の中はねもう躍動している、
subtitles.english: ...I'm sure everyone's hearts are racing.

subtitles.original: あまりの感動にフレアちゃんが僕を見てくれたときっと思っている、よな？
subtitles.english: You're all probably thinking, "Flare-chan looked at me!" right?

subtitles.original: まあそんな感じでですね、まあちょっと中間にオリ曲を入れさせていただきました！
subtitles.english: So, like that, I've put an original song in the middle!

subtitles.original: この後はですね、まあちょっとかっこいい系の曲、もしくは、綺麗かな？
subtitles.english: After this, well, maybe some cool songs, or maybe something beautiful?

subtitles.original: なんかみんなが結構好きな曲とか、私が好きな曲を入れさせていただきましたので、
subtitles.english: I've included songs that everyone likes and songs that I like...

subtitles.original: そちらもね、あのー聴いていただきたいなって思うんですけど
subtitles.english: ...so I'd like you to listen to those too.

subtitles.original: もう一回ねあのステージを変えさせていただこうかなと思います
subtitles.english: I think I'll change the stage once more.

subtitles.original: なんでアリーナを挟んだのかというと、やっぱなんかこう、
subtitles.english: The reason I put the arena in between is, you know...

subtitles.original: この曲はね、みんなとここで盛り上がりたいなと思いましたので、
subtitles.english: ...I wanted to get hyped up with everyone here for this song.

subtitles.original: 一旦こちらに飛ばさせていただきました！
subtitles.english: So I jumped over here for a bit!

subtitles.original: ということでですね、えー引き続き、
subtitles.english: So, following that,

subtitles.original: まだまだいろいろ歌っていきますので、
subtitles.english: I'm going to keep singing more songs,

subtitles.original: 盛り上がっていってくれると嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: and I hope you'll keep getting hyped up!

subtitles.original: では！まだまだ続いて楽しんでくれると嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: Well then! I hope you continue to enjoy what's coming next!

subtitles.original: この世で造花より綺麗な花はないわ
subtitles.english: In this world, there is no flower more beautiful than an artificial one

subtitles.original: なぜならば全ては嘘で出来てる アンチパシー
subtitles.english: Because everything is made of lies, antipathy

subtitles.original: 絶望の雨は私の傘を突いて
subtitles.english: The rain of despair pokes at my umbrella

subtitles.original: 湿らす前髪と心の何れ 煩わしいわ
subtitles.english: My bangs and heart are both getting wet; it's annoying

subtitles.original: いつしか言の葉はとうに枯れきって
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, my words had long since withered away

subtitles.original: 言のみがたしに熟れている
subtitles.english: Only the "fruit of words" is ripening

subtitles.original: 鏡に映り嘘描いて 自らを見失った
subtitles.english: Reflecting in the mirror, painting lies, I've lost sight of myself

subtitles.original: ルラパッパッパラ ナゾナゾ数えて遊びましょう
subtitles.english: Rura-pappa-para, let's play by counting riddles

subtitles.original: ルラパッパッパラ なぜなぜここで踊ってるのでしょう
subtitles.english: Rura-pappa-para, why, oh why, am I dancing here?

subtitles.original: 簡単なことも解らないわ あたしって何だっけ
subtitles.english: I don't even understand simple things; what was "I" again?

subtitles.original: それすら夜の手 解されて 愛の様に
subtitles.english: Even that is unraveled by the hand of night, like love

subtitles.original: さよならも言えぬまま泣いた フォニィ 嘘に絡まって
subtitles.english: I cried without being able to say goodbye, Phony, entangled in lies
